title: Ticket #1541: condor_config_val -debug broken
description:
Bad - 
$ CONDOR_CONFIG=ONLY_ENV _CONDOR_ALL_DEBUG=D_HOSTNAME condor_config_val -debug FULL_HOSTNAME
localhost.localdomain

Good - 

$ CONDOR_CONFIG=ONLY_ENV _CONDOR_ALL_DEBUG=D_HOSTNAME ./condor_config_val -debug FULL_HOSTNAME
07/28 12:21:23 Finding local host information, calling gethostname()
07/28 12:21:23 gethostname() returned a host with no domain "eeyore"
07/28 12:21:23 Trying to find full hostname and IP addr for "eeyore"
07/28 12:21:23 Calling gethostbyname(eeyore)
07/28 12:21:23 Found IP addr in hostent: 127.0.0.1
07/28 12:21:23 Trying to find full hostname from hostent
07/28 12:21:23 Main name in hostent "eeyore" contains no '.', checking aliases
07/28 12:21:23 Checking alias "localhost.localdomain"
07/28 12:21:23 Alias "localhost.localdomain" is fully qualified
07/28 12:21:23 Trying to initialize local IP address (config file not read)
07/28 12:21:23 Already found IP with gethostbyname()
07/28 12:21:23 Trying to initialize local IP address (after reading config)
07/28 12:21:23 NETWORK_INTERFACE not in config file, using existing value
localhost.localdomain
remarks:
2010-Jul-28 11:22:17 by matt:
Issue appears to be that Termlog and dprintf_config are called before the config file is read.
